title: Mr. Imperium 1951 (Musical, Romance) with Lana Turner, Ezio Pinza - Subtitles

sources.title: Mr. Imperium 1951 (Musical, Romance) with Lana Turner, Ezio Pinza - Subtitles
sources.description:
M-G-M's Singing TECHNICOLOR Romance!
A beautiful singer/dancer turned actress, and playboy crown prince turned monarch, have their clandestine romance interfered with by their changing circumstances.

Director: Don Hartman
Writers: Edwin H. Knopf, Don Hartman 
Stars: Lana Turner, Ezio Pinza, Marjorie Main 
Genres: Classics, Drama, Musical, Romance
